title: What data will be erased during an update?
answer:
When you update your phone, data including contacts, messages, email accounts, system settings and installed apps will be deleted. It is recommended that you back up important data from your phone before updating. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=123342)

 HOTA updates won't erase data from your phone.
keywords: upgrade, data, delete, version, lose, format
